overview: When Leena and Nicole's car breaks down, they take refuge in a haunted mansion inhabited by Dracula, Wolfman and of course, Frankensteinâ€™s monster! Before they know it, the girls are reluctant heroines in a fight to save the world. They must utilize their brains, beauty, talent, but mostly oral sex to fight the evil they face.
title: Leena Meets Frankenstein
